item.description:
UPDATE: I was able to add a third tee time at 11:16AM.

I have two tee times on SundayÂ June 10th at 11:00AM and 11:08AM at Hickory Hill if anyone wants to hit the links this weekend. Greens Fee is $67.00 and includes cart. Easy to get to just north of Boston off Rte 93.

Friendly, casual clubhouse for those who enjoy stopping at the 19th hole after the round. Join if you can.

http://golfhickoryhill.com/

How the Waiting List Works:

Folks on the waiting list receive an email whenever a spot opens up. The first to respond moves from the waiting list into the open slot.

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Hickory Hill - Sun 6/10
